1.name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
1.description: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

2.name: Once Upon a Time in the West
2.description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

3.name: Rosemary's Baby
3.description: A young couple moves in to an apartment only to be surrounded by peculiar neighbors and occurrences. When the wife becomes mysteriously pregnant, paranoia over the safety of her unborn child begins to control her life.

4.name: La mujer murcielago
4.description: Batwoman is called to investigate a whacked out scientist that is capturing wrestlers and using their spinal fluid to create a Gill Man.

5.name: Planet of the Apes
5.description: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.

6.name: Night of the Living Dead
6.description: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a bloodthirsty, flesh-eating breed of monsters who are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.

7.name: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
7.description: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

8.name: Barbarella
8.description: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

9.name: Romeo and Juliet
9.description: When two young members of feuding families meet, forbidden love ensues.

10.name: The Wrecking Crew
10.description: Gold bullion worth USD 1 billion has been stolen from a hijacked train in Denmark. The main suspect is Count Massimo Contini. The US government sends Matt Helm, one of its top agents, to investigate and recover the gold.

11.name: The Swimmer
11.description: A man spends a summer day swimming as many pools as he can all over a quiet suburban town.

12.name: Bullitt
12.description: An all guts, no glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.

13.name: Where Eagles Dare
13.description: Allied Agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding American Brigadier General George Carnaby (Robert Beatty) prisoner, but that's not all that's really going on.

14.name: Oliver!
14.description: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.

15.name: The Heart Is a Lonely Hunter
15.description: When deaf mute Singer moves to a small city to be near his only friend confined in a hospital, he grows attached to his landlady's sensitive 16-year-old daughter.

16.name: The Lion in Winter
16.description: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. They and his wife variously plot to force him.

17.name: Hang 'Em High
17.description: When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.

18.name: The Thomas Crown Affair
18.description: A debonair, adventuresome bank executive believes he has pulled off the perfect multi-million dollar heist, only to match wits with a sexy insurance investigator who will do anything to get her man.

19.name: The Odd Couple
19.description: Two friends try sharing an apartment, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.

20.name: Funny Girl
20.description: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

21.name: Dracula Has Risen from the Grave
21.description: When Castle Dracula is exorcised by the Monsignor, it accidentally brings the Count back from the dead. Dracula follows the Monsignor back to his hometown, preying on the holy man's beautiful niece and her friends.

22.name: The Love Bug
22.description: A race car driver becomes a champion with a Volkswagen Beetle with a mind of its own.

23.name: Yours, Mine and Ours
23.description: A widower with ten children falls for a widow with eight, and they must decide about forming a huge, unconventional family.

24.name: Bandolero!
24.description: Mace Bishop masquerades as a hangman in order to save his outlaw brother from the gallows, runs to Mexico chased by the Sheriff's posse and fights against Mexican bandits.

25.name: Candy
25.description: Candy Christian (Ewa Aulin), an innocent high-schooler, encounters numerous colorful characters and humorous sexual situations while attempting to find meaning in life.

26.name: The Party
26.description: A clerical mistake results in a bumbling Indian film star being invited to an exclusive Hollywood party instead of being fired.

27.name: Yellow Submarine
27.description: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred (Lance Percival) in his Yellow Submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music hating Blue Meanies.

28.name: Witchfinder General
28.description: A young soldier seeks to put an end to the evils caused by a vicious witch-hunter when the latter terrorizes his fiancée and kills her uncle.

29.name: Coogan's Bluff
29.description: Arizona Deputy Sheriff Coogan (Clint Eastwood) is sent to New York City to escort an escaped fugitive back for trial.

30.name: If....
30.description: In this allegorical story, a revolution led by pupil Mick Travis takes place at an old established private school in England.

31.name: The Devil Rides Out
31.description: Devil worshipers plan to convert two new victims.

32.name: Ice Station Zebra
32.description: USN nuclear sub USS Tigerfish must rush to the North Pole to rescue the staff of Drift Ice Station Zebra weather station.

33.name: Teorema
33.description: A mysterious young man seduces each member of a bourgeois family. When he suddenly leaves, how will their lives change?

34.name: The Green Berets
34.description: Col. Mike Kirby picks two teams of crack Green Berets for a mission in South Vietnam. First off is to build and control a camp that is trying to be taken by the enemy the second mission is to kidnap a North Vietnamese General.

35.name: Journey to Shiloh
35.description: At the beginning of the Civil War, seven friends embark on a cross-country journey in order to join the Confederate army.

36.name: Vargtimmen
36.description: While vacationing on a remote Scandanavian island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.

37.name: The Split
37.description: Thieves fall out when over a half million dollars goes missing after the daring and carefully planned robbery of the Los Angeles Coliseum during a football game, each one accusing the other of having the money.

38.name: Histoires extraordinaires
38.description: Anthology film from three European directors based on stories by Edgar Allan Poe: a cruel princess haunted by a ghostly horse, a sadistic young man haunted by his double, and an alcoholic actor haunted by the Devil.

39.name: Il grande silenzio
39.description: A mute gunfighter defends a young widow and a group of outlaws against a gang of bounty killers in the winter of 1898, and a grim, tense struggle unfolds.

40.name: Kaijû sôshingeki
40.description: Female aliens take control of Earth's monsters and begin using them to destroy the human race.

41.name: Charly
41.description: An intellectually disabled man undergoes an experiment that gives him the intelligence of a genius.

42.name: Head
42.description: The Monkees are tossed about in a psychedelic, surrealist, plotless, circular bit of fun fluff.

43.name: Vixen!
43.description: Vixen lives in a Canadian mountain resort with her naive pilot husband. While he's away flying in tourists, she gets it on with practically everybody including a husband and his wife, and ...                See full summary »

44.name: Greetings
44.description: An offbeat, episodic film about three friends, Paul, a shy love-seeker, Lloyd, a vibrant conspiracy nut, and Jon, an aspiring filmmaker and peeping tom. The film satirizes free-love, the ...                See full summary »

45.name: Yabu no naka no kuroneko
45.description: Two women are raped and killed by samurai soldiers. Soon they reappear as vengeful ghosts who seduce and brutally murder the passing samurai.

46.name: The Girl on a Motorcycle
46.description: A married woman leaves her husband and zooms off on her motorcycle to see her lover.

47.name: La morte ha fatto l'uovo
47.description: A love triangle develops between three people who run a high tech chicken farm. It involves Anna (who owns the farm), her husband Marco (who kills prostitutes in his spare time) and ...                See full summary »

48.name: Skidoo
48.description: Infamous psychedelic all-star comedy about ex-gangster Tony Banks, who's called out of retirement by mob kingpin God to carry out a hit on fellow mobster "Blue Chips" Packard. When Banks ...                See full summary »

49.name: Hellfighters
49.description: The story of macho oil well firefighters and their wives.

50.name: Ruba al prossimo tuo
50.description: A detective gets involved with the beautiful daughter of an old friend. The daughter turns out to be a jewel thief, who in turn gets the detective involved in a caper in Austria.
